title: Workshop on Feedback-Driven Online Learning Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic job-related language proficiency and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Acquiring methods to implement formative assessment and feedback mechanisms in blended learning with BYOD, applicable to real-world tasks

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose learners' understanding levels by categorizing them into three or more tiers using formative assessment tools when designing online courses
Learners can design strategies to improve learner performance by 15% or more within two weeks by establishing feedback loops
Learners can systematize integrated design processes for content-assessment-feedback into three or more stages using LMS functionalities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
